title: New Placements for 2015
body: this needs to change, ive dropped 5 divisions down from my previous season and won 6/10 of my games? why...

replies.body: ur mmr was probs lower than normal in Season 4.
Or it's because as riot has actually said, the reset this season is harder then most other seasons.

This season's placements have hardly any affect on players that had good/average MMR while players who had bad MMR are being punished hardcore for it. That's why we're seeing trash players complaining about how unfair placements are on the boards.
